fields.body:
Dear {{checkout.retailer.first_name}}:

A new Stunable order {link to order confirmation number/history} has been placed by {{checkout.purchaser}}. Please login {{url}} to print your packing slip, shipping label, and ship your order. If you have any issues shipping the order within 2 business days of receiving this message, email us at orders@stunable.com and we'll take care of it. 

Cheers!

Sam and Lizzy 
Stunable Co-Founders 

www.stunable.com
fields.name: retailer-order-placed
fields.subject: Stunable Order Placed - {{checkout.ref}}

fields.body:
"Dear {{checkout.purchaser.first_name}}:

Your Stunable order {{url}} has been placed. We'll make sure to let you know when the order has been shipped. In the meantime, feel free to contact us at orders@stunable.com if you have any questions, comments, or concerns.

Cheers!

Sam and Lizzy 
Stunable Co-Founders 

www.stunable.com
fields.name: shopper-order-placed
fields.subject: Stunable Order Placed - {{checkout.ref}}

fields.body:
"Dear {{checkout.retailer.first_name}}:

An order {{checkout.ref}} was placed by {{checkout.purchaser.first_name}} {{checkout.purchaser.last_name}} on {{purchase.purchased_at}} and needs to be shipped. Please login {{url}} and update the status of the order or else the order will be cancelled and refunded to the buyer.

Cheers!

Sam and Lizzy 
Stunable Co-Founders
fields.name: retailer-ship-reminder
fields.subject: REMINDER: Stunable Order Placed - {{checkout.ref}}

fields.body:
"Dear {{checkout.purchaser.first_name}}:

Your Stunable order {{checkout.ref}} has been shipped! You can track the status of your shipment here: {{track_url}} or check your order history {{url}}.

Cheers!

Sam, Brie, and Lizzy 
Stunable Co-Founders 

www.stunable.com 
{logo picture and twitter/FB links}"
fields.name: shopper-purchase_shipped
fields.subject: Stunable Order Shipped - {{checkout.ref}}

fields.body:
Dear {{checkout.retailer.first_name}}:

THE FOLLOWING EMAIL HAS BEEN SENT TO  {{checkout.purchaser.first_name}} {{checkout.purchaser.last_name}} regarding order number {{checkout.ref}}


"Dear {{checkout.purchaser.first_name}}:

Your Stunable order {{checkout.ref}} has been shipped! You can track the status of your shipment here: {{track_url}} or check your order history {{url}}.

Cheers!

Sam, Brie, and Lizzy 
Stunable Co-Founders 

www.stunable.com 
"
fields.name: retailer-purchase_shipped
fields.subject: Stunable Order Shipped - {{checkout.ref}}

fields.body:
"Dear {{checkout.retailer.first_name}}:

Just confirming that your order {{checkout.ref}} has been delivered to {{checkout.purchaser.first_name}} {{checkout.purchaser.last_name}}!

Cheers!

Sam and Lizzy 
Stunable Co-Founders 

www.stunable.com
fields.name: retailer-purchase_delivered
fields.subject: Stunable Order Delivered - {{checkout.ref}}

fields.body:
Dear {{retailer.user.first_name|capfirst}}:

Thanks for requesting to become a Stunable Stylist. We'll review your information and a member of our sales team will contact you shortly.

Cheers!

Sam and Lizzy 
Stunable Co-Founders 

www.stunable.com
fields.name: retailer-signedup
fields.subject: Stunable Stylist Submission Received

fields.body:
Dear {{retailer.user.first_name}}:

Welcome to Stunable! You now have access to manage and sell your products on Stunable.com.

Login to view/update your product inventory, order history, or our help pages here: {{url}}

Cheers!

Sam and Lizzy 
Stunable Co-Founders 

www.stunable.com
fields.name: retailer-welcome
fields.subject: Stunable Stylist Account Approved!

fields.body:
Dear {{upload.retailer.user.first_name}}:

Thanks for your product upload. We will need a little bit of time to process it but we'll get back to you ASAP if we have any questions.

Thanks again!

Cheers!

Sam, Brie, and Lizzy 
Stunable Co-Founders 

www.stunable.com
fields.name: retailer-product_upload
fields.subject: Stunable Product Upload {{upload.id}}

fields.body:
Dear {{retailer.first_name}}:

{{checkout.purchaser.first_name}} {{checkout.purchaser.last_name}} has requested to return order {{url}}. We'll send you tracking information as soon as the return has been shipped. If you have any questions about our return policy, you can email us at returns@stunable.com. 

Cheers!

Sam and Lizzy 
Stunable Co-Founders 

www.stunable.com
fields.name: retailer-return_requested
fields.subject: Return Requested: Stunable Order {{checkout.ref}}

fields.body:
"Dear {{checkout.purchaser.first_name}}:

You have requested to return order {{url}}.  Visit {{url}} to print your return shipping label and packing slip. Keep in mind that if you choose to return your purchase, you will be charged a $9.95 restocking fee. If you have any questions about our return policy, you can email us at returns@stunable.com. 

Cheers!

Sam and Lizzy 
Stunable Co-Founders 

www.stunable.com
fields.name: shopper-return_requested
fields.subject: Return Requested: Stunable Order {{checkout.ref}}

fields.body:
"Dear {{checkout.retailer.first_name}}:

The return requested by {{checkout.purchaser.first_name}} {{checkout.purchaser.last_name}} of {{checkout.ref}} has been shipped. You can track the status of your shipment here:{{track_url}} or check your order history {{url}}.If you have any questions about our return policy, you can email us at returns@stunable.com. 

Cheers!

Sam and Lizzy 
Stunable Co-Founders 

www.stunable.com
fields.name: retailer-return_shipped
fields.subject: Return Shipped: Stunable Order {{checkout.ref}}

fields.body:
Dear {{checkout.retailer.first_name}}:

It looks to us at Stunable that the return requested by {{checkout.purchaser.first_name}} {{checkout.purchaser.last_name}} of {{checkout.ref}} has been delivered to you. If we haven't gotten in touch with you already, please email us at returns@stunable.com to let us know that you have received the product or products in good condition so we can initite the refund. 

Cheers!

Sam and Lizzy 
Stunable Co-Founders 

www.stunable.com 
{logo picture and twitter/FB links}"
fields.name: retailer-return_delivered
fields.subject: Return Delivered: Stunable Order {{checkout.ref}}

fields.body:
Dear {{checkout.purchaser.first_name}}:

Your return for order {{url}} has been delivered to {{checkout.retailer}}. Stunable will refund you shortly. Keep in mind that we have to keep $9.95 as a restocking fee (sorry about that). If you have any questions about our return policy, you can email us at returns@stunable.com. 

Cheers!

Sam and Lizzy 
Stunable Co-Founders 

www.stunable.com
fields.name: shopper-return_delivered
fields.subject: Return Delivered: Stunable Order {{checkout.ref}}
